Use this action again to do the following:

fields.name: eNoPricebookEntryFoundAssetMsg
fields.fieldText:
Unable to add Opportunity Product:

No standard Pricebook Entry found for Product of selected Asset.

Use the "Back" button to search for a different Asset.

fields.name: eNoPricebookEntryFoundProductMsg
fields.fieldText:
Unable to add Opportunity Product:

No standard Pricebook Entry found for selected replacement Product.

Use the "Back" button to search for a different Product.
